document.full_text: u.s. and chinese officials opened two days of talks on monday in broad agreement on the need to bolster a fragile global recovery but with washington pushing for an easing up in china's crackdown on dissidents.
document.title: u.s. pushes china on human rights as talks open
lines_and_colors: u.s. and chinese officials opened two days of talks on monday in broad agreement on the need to bolster a fragile global recovery but with washington pushing for an easing up in china's crackdown on dissidents.
